name: Gifts for the Living
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
You call upon the spirits of the deceased for restoration to avoid their fate. Every non-reanimated creature you choose within range heals 2d12 hit points. Each corpse and reanimated creature within range adds an additional 1d12 hit points, to a maximum of 6d12 hit points.

Creatures healed by this spell must finish a rest before they can be healed by it again.
empower: Also removes the poisoned condition and ends any disease effects on creatures.
